isis.stitle: International® MaxxForce™ DT, 9 and 10 Engine Service Manual - Crankcase, Crankshaft, and Camshaft - Installation - Crankshaft Gear and Oil Pump Spline Drive

svcproc.title: Crankshaft Gear and Oil Pump Spline Drive

figure.caption: Crankshaft gear and oil pump spline drive

calloutgroup.callout1: Slotted spring pin, 3.967 x 7.938 mm (5/32 x 5/16 in)

step1.para: Carefully tap slotted spring pin into hole in the crankshaft.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, wear heat insulated gloves when handling heated components.

step1.para:
Heat crankshaft gear and oil pump spline drive on a hot plate
or other controlled heat source to 188 to 202 °C (370 to 395 °F).

Install heated crankshaft gear while wearing heat insulated gloves. Align the slotted spring pin in the crankshaft with corresponding slot in the crankshaft gear. Press crankshaft gear against the crankshaft shoulder and hold until gear cools (approximately 30 seconds).

Install heated oil pump spline drive on the crankshaft against the crankshaft gear while wearing heat insulated gloves. Hold spline drive against the crank gear until spline cools (no orientation required).
